name: Orompaquenga: Acolyte of The Mass
description:
A small mod for Isopodomancer's game "Orompaquenga" aiming to add a bit of more content. Anxious Mode recommended.

I greatly recommend playing base Orom first. https://isopodomancer.itch.io/orompaquenga

Planned changes are:

- Rebalanced skills, enemies and items for more challenging fights.

- New areas and rooms.

- More optional content in anxious mode.

This mod is harder than base game, there are more enemies and they deal much more damage. It is recommended you play the base game first.
